keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map K previousTab
map J nextTab

map \ passNextKey normal

map <a-,> moveTabLeft count=1000
map <a-.> moveTabRight count=1000

map yF LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
br: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Brave
bg: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
ya: https://yandex.com/search/?text=%s Yandex

gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s GoogleMaps
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wikipedia
gs: https://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%s Google Scholar

gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub Repo
nx: https://search.nixos.org/packages?channel=unstable&type=packages&query=%s Nixos

?: javascript:location='https://search.brave.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'
